patterns: What is Data Science Community SRM?
responses:
We are a technology-driven Data Science-based student-led innovation community at SRM IST.
Our aim is to foster development and entrepreneurial skills among students and work as a community that inspires thousands,e are a technology-driven Data Science-based student-led innovation community at SRM IST.
